description.en: Let's see how fast you can control your robot. Lay down your challenge field and run your robot around it as fast as it can.
The robot cannot touch the challenge field at any point.

<20 seconds = Good job! Are you ready for another round?
<15 seconds = Wow! Excellent job! Do you think you can do it even faster?
<10 = Outstanding! You are such a pro! Well done!
Bonus task: Can you do the same by programing your robot?

Let's count your points.
<20 = 5 points
<15 = 10 points
<10 = 15 points
We would love to see your results, please share it thorough our forum page by clicking on the following link:
